description.value:
Lasts for 3 Days, during which provides +20 to Survival Tests made in Arid Environments, character only needs half the usual Water intake. However also suffer -10 to Strength and Perception Tests and -5 to Fellowship based tests. Not addictive, but can lead to systematic damage if used too much.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 200 T
